snippet.title: Potions: A Curious Tale - Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer produced by Stumbling Cat and Imagos Films. 

Potions: A Curious Tale is an adventure crafting game where combat is not always the answer. Play as a young girl, Luna, who overcomes obstacles with the potions she brews. Quick thinking allows her to dodge the monsters that would be costly to engage and defeat only the ones that hold ingredients she needs.

http://www.stumblingcat.com/

Kickstarter: http://tinyurl.com/PotionsKickstarter

Social Media 
https://twitter.com/rikukat 
https://twitter.com/stumblingcat 
https://www.facebook.com/stumblingcat

Alpha/Beta Key / Email Subscribe Requests 
http://stumblingcat.com/subscribe.html
